price: 52. Diggah tama sin diini inki diini Yi-farmoytiitow, kaadu anu sin Rabbi kinniyok sin elle amrisem abtaanaah, sin как waaseemik waasimtaanamal yok meesita keenik iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَإِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-ittaqūni
